summary: Added a single-file, responsive HTML page at index.html.

validation.command: cd /var/www/prdtest/.worktrees/test/FEAT-0001 && python3 -c "from pathlib import Path; p=Path('index.html'); assert p.exists(); t=p.read_text(encoding='utf-8'); assert t.lstrip().lower().startswith('<!doctype html>'); assert 'zh-CN' in t; assert '<nav' in t and '</nav>' in t; assert '<main' in t and '</main>' in t; print('basic html checks: ok')"
validation.notes: Basic presence checks for doctype, language tag, and key semantic sections.

notes: Preview by opening index.html in any modern browser.
